ZAST.AI INC, an innovative AI startup hailing from the United States, is at the forefront of the cybersecurity domain. Our mission is anchored in harnessing the power of artificial intelligence to forge a unified security solution. This cutting-edge platform is designed to autonomously detect, scrutinize, and confirm vulnerabilities, thereby equipping developers and users globally with smarter and more proficient solutions to security weaknesses. Utilizing Sophisticated AI large-scale models, ZAST.AI, our system, delves into the intricate landscape of code, unearthing latent security hazards and threats. It offers reliable recommendations for remedies and validation techniques, empowering users to bolster the security and resilience of their applications. The large-scale AI model that underpins our technology is built upon the latest advancements in deep neural networks and natural language processing. It is adept at comprehending a diverse array of programming languages, frameworks, libraries, and dependencies. By extracting vital security features and benchmarks, it constructs a highly accurate model for identifying and analyzing vulnerabilities. Furthermore, it leverages the strategic capabilities of reinforcement learning and adversarial generative networks to craft and execute bespoke verification and exploitation strategies. This ensures an exhaustive sweep and precise targeting of code vulnerabilities.

ZAST.AI Helper is a developer assistance tool. It is used to help operations and security personnel who use our company's system by providing test account session information for the systems to be tested. Operations developers can easily use ZAST.AI Helper to conveniently submit test account session information, helping them detect vulnerabilities in systems that require login authentication.
